page.title: 10SHOPPING IN HOLBROOKS
page.content: {Debbie Bee age11/Paul Partridge age10 On Wednesday June 12th a group of ten children went to do a{shopping survey in{Holbrook Lane. }They interviewed 28 people who used those shops.We asked 8 questions.One man came from Birmingham which was the furthest away he worked at the Dunlop.One of the questions we asked was:_Is there any other kind of{shop}that you would like here that isn't here at the moment?but most people were satisfied. {DIY Colin Oddy aged 11 } A lot of waste land in the Longford area has had huge shops built on it {Smiths Do It All}sells the lot.The big garden centre sells seeds and plants.At{MFI}you can buy furniture. {Complete Auto}is a{Do It Yourself shop for motorists.In Judds Lane there are gypsies.They have a massive dog which luckily is on a chain.
